result.title: IOI Mini Training Contest Group
result.content:
Hi all,

In this group, There will be 3 contests consisting of 3 problems each from various contests from different countries. The contests will be in ACM-ICPC format (since this is the default CF format) and will last for 5 hours. (But you can of course virtually participate any time you want)

Since the problems aren't original, it's very likely that you might have seen the problems before, or even solved them before (and probably they came from the OIs of your country). The contest schedule will be posted shortly.

UPD : You may view the contest schedule at the Contests tab now. The schedule is quite tight because my training camp starts at 2 August and so they should be held within these 2 days. You can still use Virtual Participation if the timing doesn't suits you though.

UPD2 : NibNalin and ziadxkabakibi has been added as manager. They said they will upload some contests in the future. Message me if you would like to contribute problems to the group as well.
